111  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1) {
112 
113  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
114  Resize(v1.GetSize());
115  LogWarning("Cs2HammingWindow: Resizing window");

133  void operator()(SeqViewDouble& v1, SeqViewDouble& v2) {
134 
135  Dmatrix *arg1 = v1.GetData();
136  Dmatrix *arg2 = v2.GetData();
137 
138  if (v1.GetSize() != mWindow.size()) {
139  Resize(v1.GetSize());
140  LogWarning("Cs2HammingWindow: Resizing window");
141  }
142 
143  if ((arg1->size1() != arg2->size1()) || (arg1->size2() != arg2->size2())) {
144  arg2->resize(arg1->size1(), arg1->size2());
145  LogWarning("Cs2HammingWindow: Resizing output");
146  }
147 
148  execute(*arg1, *arg2);
149 
150  v2.SetScale(v1.GetScale());
151  v2.SetStart(v1.GetStart());
152  v2.SetSampling(v1.GetSampling());
153 
154 
155  };

162  void Resize(unsigned int size) {
163  BaseWindow::Resize(size);
164  FillWindow();

201 
208  void FillWindow() {
209  double n = (double) mWindow.size();
210 
211  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mWindow.size(); i++) {
212 
213  mWindow(i) = 0.53836 - 0.46164 * cos(2 * M_PI * i / (n - 1));
214 
215  }
216  Normalize();
217  };
218 
219 
220  };
